Features of Online Live Classes

  • Comprehensive coverage of General Studies Prelims and Mains syllabus.
  • After attending Live class, access to recorded classes also available.
  • Pattern-proof teaching methodology which focuses on strengthening of concepts and fundamentals as to succeed in any testing pattern of UPSC, Civil Services Examination.
  • Experienced and seasoned faculties.
  • Online doubts clearing sessions.
  • Well researched and comprehensive online study material.
  • Online Test series for both Prelims and Mains.
  • Students’ portal for extended learning apart from Online Live Classes.
  • Online subject tests and analysis.
  • Online Current Affairs updates.
  • Online Yearly Roundup of Prelims and Mains
  • Workshops by Successful Candidates.
  • Guest Lectures by retired civil servants.
